venue.name: Fearing Pond, Myles Standish State Forest

item.description:
It's almost time for the 6th Annual Take Me Fishin'!—our free family fishing derby and nature appreciation event.

Fishing poles and bait will be provided, or bring your own. Fishing Licenses for the event provided by Mass Wildlife.

The pond is stocked with 12" trout by MassWildlife just before the event.

Prizes awarded for biggest fish and many runners-up!   Prizes are donated by many of the local sponsors listed on our home page. (Full list of prizes to be posted as we get closer to the date.)

Last year's prizes included:

  • free day on an ocean-going fishing charter from Capt. John,
  • kayak rentals from EMS

and many other exciting prizes.

MA fishing license is provided by

 

MassWildlife this day only between 10am and 2pm.

Join us for fishing contests and fun nature activities for all ages.

Activities have included:

Make Your Own Forest Critters,

Forest Discovery,

Ping Pong Goldfish,

Goytaku Fish Printing,

Birding for Children,

Beginning Letterboxing,

We will sell raffle tickets for prizes to benefit MSSF

The 2012 Photography Contest Awards will be announced. (Entries closed August 31st.)

Bring a picnic or BBQ and plan to spend the whole day. Fearing Pond is arguably the most beautiful pond in MSSF but it is open to the general public one day only—at the fishing event!

The event will happen rain or shine. Leashed dogs are welcome, but not in the water, please. The event will take place at Fearing Pond, which is stocked with trout just before the event.

To find Fearing Pond-- Enter the forest

at eith

er of the main entrances and follow the fish signs.

  • This fun family fishing event is accessible, free and open to the public.
  • Sponsored by
  • The Friends of Myles Standish State Forest,
  • The Department of Conservation and Recreation and

 

 

 

 

MassWildlife

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TELL YOUR FRIENDS!

Can you help us out? We need people to bait hooks, untangle lines, help with crafts tables, sell raffle tickets, etc.  This is traditionally one of our biggest events of the year.  We need your help! If you can volunteer please email friends@friendsmssf.com. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the Forest and follow the fish!

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group
